text: They Were the First () is a 1956 Soviet war drama movie directed by Yuri Egorov.Михаила Державина похоронили на Новодевичьем кладбищеОни были первыми It stars Georgi Yumatov, Liliana Alyoshnikova, and Mark Bernes. ==Actors== * Georgi Yumatov as Stepan Barabash * Liliana Alyoshnikova as Glasha * Mark Bernes as Rodionov * Mikhail Ulyanov as Alexey Kolyvanov *Mikhail Derzhavin as Yevgeny Gorovskoy, student and poet *Nina Krachkovskaya as Yelena * Mikhail Kondratiev as Lenin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1956 movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies
title: They Were the First
